tool_description: Generate Images using AI from text prompts
name: Text2IMG
title: Text2IMG

api_list.name: Generate Image
api_list.description: The image generations endpoint allows you to create an original image given a text prompt. Generated images based on text. The more detailed the description, the more likely you are to get the result that you or your end user want.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://text2img.p.rapidapi.com/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "text2img.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://text2img.p.rapidapi.com/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "text2img.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
